Reviews.Title: One-fifth the price, better than one-fifth as good
Reviews.Author: Joe C.
Reviews.Content: To be clear, these batteries are clearly inferior to the genuine Panasonic battery that came with my DMC-GF6. However, they work out to one-fifth the price. In my opinion, they are better than one-fifth as good. This was a good buy for me. I rarely use up the battery that came with the camera in a single day. However, these are nice to have as backups in case I do find myself with a fully discharged battery. On the other hand, if you find yourself often replacing the battery during the day, you might want to get the genuine Panasonic version. Another consideration is that cheap knock-off batteries have a reputation for having much shorter life spans. I haven't owned this battery long enough to comment on that.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery
Battery Specs: 1400 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Panasonic DMW-BLG10 Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 1400 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery for Panasonic Lumix DMC-GF6 Mirrorless Micro Four Thirds Digital Camera and Panasonic DMW-BLG10
